src:
Fright night at St Martin's church in Renton
Ghosts and ghouls of all shapes, sizes and patterns turned up at last week's event.
01 Nov 2019, 17:09 by Lennox Herald, https://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/authors/lennox-herald/
It was fright night at St Martin’s Church in Renton last weekend as some terrifying characters turned up for a party.


(Image: Brian Averell)

The Halloween event took place at the hall on Saturday night.
Witches and skeletons partied the night away with Buzz Lightyear and Woody and a cute wee unicorn.
For more local news from West Dunbartonshire click here .


(Image: Brian Averell)



(Image: Brian Averell)
